programme.desc: An adventure-filled animation. Aura is at the academy to learn how to use her magic, but she discovers that the school has many dark secrets that she must uncover.

programme.title: Space Dogs: Tropical Adventure
programme.desc: An animated space adventure. When a mysterious, dangerous whirlpool phenomenon appears in the tropics of the Atlantic Ocean, Belka and Strelka are sent to investigate.

programme.title: Paw Patrol: The Movie
programme.desc: The iconic animation gets a fantastic movie. Ryder and the pups are called to Adventure City to stop Mayor Humdinger from turning the bustling metropolis into a state of chaos.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A furry cast of stars feature in this animation. A struggling theatre owner holds a singing competition that becomes bigger than he imagined.

programme.title: Wonder Woman (1984)
programme.desc: Gal Gadot and Chris Pine reprise their roles in this thrilling sequel in which Diana Prince battles two new villains 65 years after the events of the 2017 hit 'Wonder Woman.'

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: Jennifer Lawrence returns in this action sequel, based on the bestselling young adult novels. Katniss and Peeta must face off against their enemies in a deadly new arena.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore and Lucy Liu revive the legendary trio of agents in romping, girl-power style. This time, they must retrieve stolen voice-ID software.

programme.title: Fear The Night
programme.desc: Maggie Q drives this action thriller. An Iraqi war veteran prepares to strike back after a group of home invaders attack during her sister's bachelorette party.

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: Silence is the key to survival in this dark and gripping horror. A family fights for their existence in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

programme.title: You Can't Run Forever
programme.desc: Oscar winner J.K. Simmons leads this suspenseful survival thriller. A teen suffering from anxiety becomes the target of a serial killer who chases her through the woods.

programme.title: You Can't Run Forever
programme.desc: Oscar winner J.K. Simmons leads this suspenseful survival thriller. A teen suffering from anxiety becomes the target of a serial killer who chases her through the woods.

programme.title: Twisted House Sitter 2
programme.desc: The twisted house sitter is back. After escaping jail, Alicia plots to take over a cosmetic empire.

programme.title: War Of The Worlds: The Attack
programme.desc: H.G Wells' alien invasion epic gets a new adaptation. Three young friends in the epicentre of an alien invasion fight for their survival.

programme.title: Falling For A Killer
programme.desc: A gripping thriller. When an Assistant DA visits her estranged parent's country house to meet her sister's fiancé, she's suspicious and convinced that he's a danger to her family.

programme.title: Best Birthday Ever
programme.desc: An animation based on a book series by Rotraut Susanne Berner. It's little Charlie's birthday, but his parents focus on his ill baby sister, prompting him to trek to his Grandma.

programme.title: Dogs At The Opera
programme.desc: An animated adventure for the whole family. Moscow, early 20th century. A stray dog, Samson, runs away from animal catchers and finds himself in the Bolshoy Theater.

programme.title: Cats In The Museum
programme.desc: An adventure-filled feline animation. A young cat and a mouse escape from a flood and end up at a museum. There, they meet an elite feline squad that protects artwork.

programme.title: Minions: The Rise Of Gru
programme.desc: A side-splitting prequel to the smash-hit animated franchise. The untold story of one twelve-year-old's dream to become the world's greatest supervillain.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
programme.desc: In the final instalment of the franchise, Jennifer Lawrence returns as Katniss, who prepares for a showdown that will change the future.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: An epic instalment in the DC franchise. Gal Gadot stars as the powerful Amazonian warrior princess who learns of WWI after rescuing a pilot and vows to use her abilities to restore peace.

programme.title: The 355
programme.desc: A formidable female ensemble propels this spy thriller. Four female spies team up to retrieve a top-secret weapon when it falls into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The Angels return for another high-octane movie. They must recover stolen rings that contain information about the identities of people in witness protection.

programme.title: Anna
programme.desc: The creator of The Professional and Lucy, Luc Besson, delivers his brand of powerful, stylised action with deadly precision. Follows the chaos left by a lethal government assassin.

programme.title: Apartment 7A
programme.desc: An eerie, unsettling prequel to the iconic horror film 'Rosemary's Baby.' An ambitious young dancer is offered another chance at fame by an older, wealthy couple, but at what cost?

programme.title: The Nun 2
programme.desc: Another terrifying showdown between good and evil. Once again, Sister Irene comes face-to-face with Valak, the demon nun, while investigating the murder of a priest in 1956 France.

programme.title: The Best Man
programme.desc: Friendships are tested in this romcom starring Taye Diggs. A man's autobiographical 'tell-all' book exposes his friends' secrets, putting his friend's wedding in jeopardy.

programme.title: Emily
programme.desc: This biopic imagines Emily Brontë's story, which inspired her book Wuthering Heights. While navigating the struggles of family life, she yearns for artistic and personal freedom.

programme.title: Escalation
programme.desc: A gritty, action-packed film. A former police officer puts aside his differences with the force and teams up with a younger detective to find his brother's murderer.

programme.title: Veronica Mars
programme.desc: Fans of the TV show are in for a treat as Kristen Bell reprises her role as a former teen sleuth. Now a qualified lawyer, Veronica returns to her hometown to investigate a murder.

programme.title: Ghost Squad
programme.desc: In this fun family adventure, three unpopular friends take on a dare to stay overnight in a supposed haunted house. But they get more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Dotty & Soul
programme.desc: A hilarious, heartfelt comedy. A hotshot entrepreneur embroiled in a scandal hires a 71-year-old woman to pose as CEO in a bid to save his company's reputation.

programme.title: The Great Holiday Bake War
programme.desc: This movie is a recipe for love. Julian and Brianna, old rivals from baking school, meet again in a TV competition, having separate plans on how to win.

programme.title: The Tiger Rising
programme.desc: Dennis Quaid and Queen Latifah drive this family film. A grieving, shy 12-year-old relocates to rural Florida. There he encounters a captured Bengal tiger hidden in the woods.

programme.title: Epic Tails
programme.desc: An adventure about friendship, bravery, and teamwork. Assisted by ageing hero Jason and the Argonauts, a mouse and a cat try to save their Greek city from the wrath of Poseidon.

programme.title: The Croods: A New Age
programme.desc: The all-star cast returns for another prehistoric adventure. This time, the Croods are challenged by a rival family, the Bettermans, who claim to be better and more evolved.

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: A young boy realises that his neighbour's house is possessed by a malevolent spirit who hungers for children. With Halloween approaching, the boy must protect his friends and stop the spirit.

programme.title: Deliver Us From Eva
programme.desc: Gabrielle Union is fantastic in this romantic comedy classic about a local playboy who's paid to date a troublesome woman so she can finally get out of her family's affairs.

programme.title: Into The Storm
programme.desc: It's man versus nature in this thrilling disaster film. A group of storm chasers and the residents of a small town try and survive a tornado superstorm.

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: Emmy-winning actor Bob Odenkirk leads this action thriller as an unassuming man who is driven to the edge after a home invasion. He goes into a rage to protect his family.

programme.title: Copshop
programme.desc: Gerard Butler leads a great ensemble cast in this action thriller. A wily con artist running from an assassin devises a scheme to hide inside a small-town police station.

programme.title: Copshop
programme.desc: Gerard Butler leads a great ensemble cast in this action thriller. A wily con artist running from an assassin devises a scheme to hide inside a small-town police station.

programme.title: Legend Of La Llorona
programme.desc: A terrifying story about a holiday horror. A couple vacationing in Mexico fights to save their son from La Llorona, the evil spirit blamed for numerous missing children.

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
programme.desc: Matt Damon stars as a psychopathic bisexual murderer in this period thriller set in late 1950's New York. Ripley heads to Europe to retrieve a millionaire playboy.

programme.title: Vertical Limit
programme.desc: Danger is all around in this treacherous adventure filled drama. A climber ascends the one of the world's biggest mountains, K2 to save his sister, who is trapped at the top.

programme.title: Skelly
programme.desc: A coming-of-age drama. After his grandfather's passing, a young boy is sent on a journey by his father to understand death while putting together the annual haunted house.

programme.title: The Holiday Dating Guide
programme.desc: A delightful holiday romcom. To satisfy her publisher, a dating coach must prove her advice works by making a man fall for her by Christmas Eve in 12 days.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game Of Shadows
programme.desc: Robert Downey Jr and Jude Law return for another action-packed mystery. This time Holmes is on the trail of Professor Moriarty who is committing crimes across Europe.

programme.title: Paddington 2
programme.desc: Paddington's delightful adventures continue in this BAFTA-nominated sequel. After a beloved book is stolen, Paddington and the Browns must find the crafty thief behind the crime.

programme.title: Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Before he ever met Donkey and Shrek, Puss was already an adventurer and hero. With Kitty Softpaws by his side, he sets out to retrieve stolen magic beans.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: A great animation based on the hit video game. An island with happy, flightless birds is visited by mysterious pigs and the only angry bird on the island is suspicious of them.

programme.title: Think Like A Man
programme.desc: Kevin Hart and an amazing ensemble cast drive this comedy. Four men try to turn the tables on their partners by using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.

programme.title: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson and Jason Statham drive this epic spin-off to the Fast franchise. They team up to stop a fierce Idris Elba, who plays a mercenary with a deadly virus.

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: Thrilling horror that takes your breath away. A trio of teenagers break into a blind man's home, but he's far from helpless, and the thieves soon become the prey.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: A woman steals from her boss and disappears on the road. When her sister, boyfriend and a private investigator search for her, they discover that her last stop is a mysterious motel.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: A woman steals from her boss and disappears on the road. When her sister, boyfriend and a private investigator search for her, they discover that her last stop is a mysterious motel.

programme.title: Lost In Translation
programme.desc: Oscar-winning funny, bittersweet film. Two lost souls visiting Tokyo find an odd solace and pensive freedom to be real in each other's company, away from their lives in America.

programme.title: The Virtuoso
programme.desc: Deception and murder descend upon a sleepy town in this movie starring Anthony Hopkins and Anson Mount. Chaos ensues when an assassin accepts a new assignment from his boss.

programme.title: Come Out Fighting
programme.desc: A gritty, action-packed WWII film. A squad of African-American soldiers are sent on a mission behind enemy lines to find their missing commanding officer and a fighter pilot.

programme.title: Intolerable Cruelty
programme.desc: George Clooney and Catherine Zeta-Jones go toe-to-toe in this confrontational romcom. A divorce lawyer meets his match in the form of his client's gold-digging wife.

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.desc: Matt Damon challenges his own fate in this sci-fi thriller. An up-and-coming politician falls for a ballet dancer. But shadowy forces threaten to keep them apart.

programme.title: The Lego Movie
programme.desc: This critical hit features beautiful animation and a superb story. Chris Pratt voices an unsuspecting Lego construction worker who is chosen to fight an evil tyrant.

programme.title: The Lego Ninjago Movie
programme.desc: An all-star cast drives this fantastic animated Lego adventure. When the teenage son of a warlord is shunned by everyone, he and his fellow ninjas set out to regain his honour.

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: The world's favourite yellow minions return as they get their own origin movie. Stuart, Kevin and Bob embark on an adventure to find a new villainous master.

programme.title: Spy Kids 4: All The Time In The World
programme.desc: The fourth installment of this adventurous franchise is bigger and better than ever. A retired spy and her step-kids are called to stop a maniac from trying to rule the world.

programme.title: The Matrix
programme.desc: A genre-defining special effects feast. Keanu Reeves stars as Neo in this sci-fi epic about people imprisoned in a fabricated system called The Matrix.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: Dangerous deep-sea horror with Jason Statham. A deadly shark, long thought to have been extinct, attacks an unsuspecting research team on an expedition in the ocean.

programme.title: What Men Want
programme.desc: Taraji P. Henson brings the fun in this entertaining romcom. A woman develops the ability to hear men's thoughts and uses it to gain an edge in her very male-dominated workplace.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: Angelina Jolie Pitt and James McAvoy push their bodies to the limit in this action blockbuster based on the hit comic book series about a secret league of superhuman assassins.

programme.desc: 'S6/E50 of 51'. Kom Ons Praat Daaroor se drie aanbieders het uiteenlopende persoonlikhede en opinies soos hulle oor nuusgebeure, snaakshede, hartstories en stories wat jou warm onder die kraag maak, gesels.

programme.title: Wie Word 'n Miljoenêr?
programme.desc: 'S5/E5 of 13'. In hierdie episode beland 'n Skotse Boer in die vuurwarm stoel. Rian is gefassineer deur sy interessante lewensverhaal en boonop lyk dinge belowend vir die speler.

programme.title: Kwêla
programme.desc: 'S27/E18 of 25'. Ons kondig die Kwêla Dorp van die Jaar wenner aan. Ons kuier by rugbyspeler Jaco van der Westhuyzen, by radio-omroeper Kolie van Coller en gesels met Hollywood aktrise, Embeth Davidtz.

programme.title: 4x4 Met André

programme.title: In Gesprek

programme.title: Fiësta

programme.title: Ancient Egypt By Train
programme.desc: 'S1/E4'. Alice ends her adventure in Aswan, whose quarries provided the granite for the country's vast collection of Ancient Egyptian monuments. She then takes a boat to see the extraordinary Philae Temple.

programme.title: Where The Wild Men Are With Ben Fogle
programme.desc: 'S10/E5 - Zambia'. Ben journeys into Zambia to live with a British family who have built a safari lodge on the edge of a national park. Ben uncovers what motivates them to keep going.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys

programme.title: Treasures Decoded

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return To The Wild
programme.desc: 'S4/E6 - Revisit: Suffolk'. Join Ben as he revisits Will Lord, a true British caveman, in Suffolk's woodlands. Discover how Will's prehistoric dreams have evolved over three years and how his loved ones embrace this lifestyle.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: 'S12/E1 - Series 12, Episode 1'. Sue Aikens sorts her plumbing before the pipes freeze. Ricko spots some moose on the way to laying traps for wolverines. Chip Hailstone and his daughters go fishing, Alaskan style.

programme.desc: 'S1/E113 - King'. In Teletubbyland, Dipsy is King. Tinky Winky delivers Tubby Custard and Tubby Toast to King Dipsy - whatever King Dipsy wants! Luckily for Tinky Winky they soon swap places.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: 'S1/E6 - Hiding'. Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and follow their dreams.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: 'S3/E109 - Mini Bluey'. When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey!

programme.desc: 'S3/E132 - Onesies'. When mum's sister Brandy comes over for a visit, she brings the kids onesies as a present, which has an unexpected effect on Bingo.

programme.title: In The Night Garden ZinkyZonk Specials
programme.desc: 'S1/E6 - HaaHoos'. When the toys of the Night Garden cant sleep, the Zonk leads them to the ZonkyZoney, an enchanted grove where they can zinkyzzzonk in peace.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club
programme.desc: 'S1/E6'. At Squirrel Club, Duggee forgets how to woof, Duggly comes to visit, Roly celebrates Potato Time, and Billy teaches everyone the Bugatron dance!

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: 'S1/E94 - Day Trip'. The Teletubbies go on a day trip to the Hidey Hup. They take turns on The Tubby Bouncy, The Tubby Slidey and The Tubby Spinny before they go on The Tubby Uppy Downy together.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: 'S2/E10'. A timid sperm whale must conquer his fears and dive deep down to help the Octonauts release Peso from a giant clam.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club
programme.desc: 'S1/E7'. Betty recalls the first time she pushed the red button, the Squirrels explore a range of emotions with Happy, Angry Bull tells a not-so-sleepy bedtime story, and the gerbils sing.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: 'S3/E110 - Unicorse'. Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.title: Bluey

programme.desc: 'S2/E1'. While Kwazii and Peso have their hands full babysitting a bunch of Adelie penguin chicks, Captain Barnacles must rescue the chicks' parents from a perilous sea storm!

programme.desc: 'S1/E17 - It's time to go to the hairdressers'. JoJo learns how fun the hairdresser's can be when she goes with Gran Gran for a trim. After helping the hairdresser, JoJo also gets her own new style ready for Ezra's party!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club
programme.desc: 'S1/E2'. Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.desc: 'S4/E12 - First Rate First Mate'. Captain Sinker's relaxing holiday is interrupted by a cheeky fly that causes her to fall off her sun lounger.

programme.desc: 'S2/E3 - Featherwand'. Bluey and Mum are off to Chloe's party and Bingo isn't invited. But armed with a magic featherwand that makes things incredibly heavy, Bingo can now stop them leaving the house.
